subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet on which to allocate the VIP address.

tenant_id.description:
The ID of the tenant who owns the pool. Only administrative users
can specify a tenant ID other than their own.

lb_method.description:
The load-balancer algorithm, which is round-robin, least-
connections, and so on, that is used to distribute traffic to the
pool members. This value, which must be supported, is dependent on
the load-balancer provider. The round-robin algorithm must be
supported.

protocol.description: The protocol of the pool, which is TCP, HTTP, or HTTPS.

name.description: Pool name. Does not have to be unique.
